column1: Auredhir was the son of Dior and the brother of Elwing. It is said that his looks were akin to his grandfather Beren and for that reason he was loved by all. He was slain by sons of Fëanor in their attempt to reclaim the Nauglamír.
Auredhir disappeared completely from later legends
column2: whereas his sister Elwing had remained.
